mapper.select: SELECT `RDCID` rdcid, group_concat(id) ids FROM `${talbe}` GROUP BY rdcid;
select group_concat(`id`) ids ,group_concat(`fanPower`) fanPowers from blowerset where `frostPower` >0 and coldStorageId in(${ids}) GROUP BY `coldStorageId`
select group_concat(`id`) ids ,group_concat(`frostPower`) frostPowers from blowerset where `frostPower` >0 and coldStorageId in(${ids}) GROUP BY `coldStorageId`
SELECT rdcid, group_concat(id) ids ,group_concat(power) powers ,sum(power)/COUNT(*) avgpower FROM `${talbe}` where `power` >0 and rdcid in(${rdcids}) GROUP BY rdcid;

SELECT `id`, `length` * `width` * `height` AS cgvolume, (select enthalpy from airenthalpy where humidity=inhumidity and temperature=intempe) as hn, (select enthalpy from airenthalpy where humidity=outhumidity and temperature=outtempe) as hw, (select IF (MIN(`value`)=MAX(`value`),MIN(`value`),MIN(`value`) +(MAX(`value`)-MIN(`value`))*(6000-MIN(`volume`))/(MAX(`volume`)-MIN(`volume`)) )AS vvlue from `ventilationset` where abs(`volume`-cgvolume) =(select min(abs(`volume`-cgvolume)) from ventilationset))as vvalue FROM `coldstorageset` WHERE `length`is not null and `width` is not null and `height` is not null and inhumidity is not null and outhumidity is not null and intempe is not null and outtempe is not null;
